abstracts.abstract: Battery Collection and Recovery;  Creating the "Safe Battery Collection and Recovery Act"; requiring a producer or retailer to fulfill certain requirements, beginning on a specified date, before selling, offering for sale, or distributing for sale in this state any covered battery or battery-containing product; requiring a BSO operating in this state to submit a battery stewardship plan to the Department of Environmental Protection annually for review and approval; requiring a BSO implementing an approved battery stewardship plan to satisfy certain requirements; requiring a BSO to submit a report to the department annually beginning on a specified date, etc.

actions.description: Referred to Environment and Natural Resources; Appropriations Committee on Agriculture, Environment, and General Government; Fiscal Policy
